price: 70. Waxaanu dhab ahaan sharafnay ilma Aadam, oo ku qaadnay barriga iyo baddaba, oo ku irsaaqnay waxyaalaha wanaagsan, waxaana ka kormarinnay in badan oo waxaan abuurnay ah kor marin.
arabic: ۞ وَلَقَدۡ كَرَّمۡنَا بَنِيٓ ءَادَمَ وَحَمَلۡنَٰهُمۡ فِي ٱلۡبَرِّ وَٱلۡبَحۡرِ وَرَزَقۡنَٰهُم مِّنَ ٱلطَّيِّبَٰتِ وَفَضَّلۡنَٰهُمۡ عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٖ مِّمَّنۡ خَلَقۡنَا تَفۡضِيلٗا

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: walaqad karramnā banī ādama waḥamalnāhum fī al-bari wal-baḥri warazaqnāhum mina al-ṭayibāti wafaḍḍalnāhum ʿalā kathīrin mimman khalaqnā tafḍīlan
